snippet.title: Schism - Sorcerer Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Hell shall fear much more than one berserk, gun-toting badass! Experience quality spells and spellcasting in the Doom engine with Schism, backed up by the base mod: Brutal Doom!

Moddb and Download https://www.moddb.com/mods/schism1
Schism Discord https://discord.gg/7Kc7jGxdYW

Additional Downloads:
Ultimate Icon of Sin https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=36899
Doom High-Resolution Texture Project https://github.com/KuriKai/DHTP
Reshade (MagicHDR and FilmicSharpen shaders used in gameplay) https://reshade.me/

Music:
Main theme - One Man Army (Soldat 2)
Prologue/Epilogue - Intro/Outro FMV (Dungeon Keeper)

Chapters:
0:00 Opening
0:25 Basic sorcery
0:40 Di-element casting
0:53 Sacrifices
1:03 Runecraft
1:18 Heretic and Hexen
2:02 Maximized sorcery
2:23 Masterful sorcery
3:00 Ending
